mapper.insert: insert into food(foodno, foodname, lat, lng, contents, phone, passwd, wdate, local, fname, zipcode, address1, address2, id) VALUES((select nvl(max(foodno),0) + 1 from food),#{foodname},0,0,#{contents},#{phone},'1234',sysdate,#{local},#{fname}, #{zipcode},#{address1},#{address2}, #{id})
mapper.select: select foodno, foodname, contents, phone, viewcnt, to_char(wdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') as wdate, local, fname, zipcode, address1, address2, id FROM food WHERE foodno=#{foodno}
